description: The initiative at Finca Sol y Valle aims to create a sustainable learning and wellness center. Established six years ago, the project focuses on community living, environmental stewardship, and self-sufficiency through organic farming and bioconstruction. With a diverse group of residents, the farm emphasizes collaboration, education, and sharing resources, while also welcoming volunteers and visitors to learn about sustainable practices and contribute to the community's growth.
name: Finca Sol y Valle
